name: Castle of Illusion
description: Mickey Mouse returns to star in Castle of Illusion, a fantastical reimagining of the Sega Genesis classic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP2+ Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core (minimum) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI 2600/Nvidia 8600 (minimum) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core (recommended) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI 4850/Nvidia 8800 (recommended) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
